org.gridgain.grid.strategies
Class GridCloudEventStrategyAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.lang.GridMetadataAwareAdapter
      org.gridgain.grid.GridCloudEnabledAdapter
          org.gridgain.grid.strategies.GridCloudEventStrategyAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, GridCloudEnabled, GridCloudStrategy, GridMetadataAware
public abstract class GridCloudEventStrategyAdapter
extends GridCloudEnabledAdapter
implements GridCloudStrategy

Cloud strategy adapter event based strategies. Subclasses should implement GridCloudEventStrategyAdapter.onEvent(GridEvent) method.
